snippet: House Republicans have called for spending up to $3.3 million this year on the special select committee tasked with investigating the deadly 2012 attacks in Benghazi, Libya....

headline.print_headline: House GOP Wants to Spend $3.3M on Benghazi Probe
headline.main: House GOP Wants to Spend $3.3M on Benghazi Probe

lead_paragraph: House Republicans have called for spending up to $3.3 million this year on the special select committee tasked with investigating the deadly 2012 attacks in Benghazi, Libya.
